name: 审判者 The Inquisitor
description: "The Inquisitor" is a short RPG game with a complete storyline and combat system. A resurrected inquisitor from the graveyard receives the instructions of God and embark on the journey of judging the sinners.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD/VIA 1Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA/AMD/Intel GT200+/R7+/HD
